name: Wonderland Adventures Custom Adventure File
summary: Learn about .WA2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: WA2 files exported from WA Editor are located within the main Editor directory in following folder: User Data\​Adventures\​Downloads Outbox
When the Player.exe program runs, it automatically loads files stored in the following directory: User Data\​Adventures\​Downloads Inbox

description: Custom adventure file used by Wonderland Adventures (WA), a 3D puzzle adventure game; stores data for a user-created adventure compiled in Wonderland Adventures Editor.
